effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 4× on the first turn of a battle, but 1× any other time.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 4× (Gen V: 5×), but only on the first turn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘が　はじまって　すぐに
使うと　捕まえやすくなる
ちょっと　変わった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
has a more successful catch rate if
used at the start of a wild encounter.

Poké Ball un po’ diversa che facilita la cattura
di un Pokémon selvatico se usata all’inizio
della lotta.

Una Poké Ball algo distinta que potencia el índice
de captura si se usa al inicio de un encuentro con
Pokémon salvajes.

Ein ungewöhnlicher Ball, der zu Beginn eines
Kampfes am wirkungsvollsten ist.

Une Poké Ball qui permet d’attraper un Pokémon
sauvage plus facilement si on l’utilise au début du
combat.

배틀이 시작되자마자
사용하면 잡기 쉬워지는
조금 특이한 볼.

せんとうが　はじまって　すぐに
つかうと　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.

Une Poké Ball qui permet d’attraper un
Pokémon sauvage plus facilement si on
l’utilise au début du combat.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
provides a better catch rate if it is
used at the start of a wild encounter.
